item.title: 【Unreleased/Unofficial (lossless)】FLAC - Alexz Johnson - The Basement Recordings (Expanded) [16bit/44.1kHz]
item.description:
The Basements Recordings is a series of compilation albums comprised of demos recorded in the basement of Alexz and Brendan Johnson's childhood home. Many of these songs were put onto demo CDs and sent to various labels. The siblings recorded demos in this fashion for years, even while Alexz was signed to a label. After Alexz was dropped and released from her contract with Epic Records in 2009, the two released an album titled Voodoo, the following year, The Basement Recordings I was released, followed by The Basement Recordings II and III being released the following 2 years.

All songs produced by Brendan James Johnson unless stated otherwise.


THE BASEMENT RECORDINGS I​
  1. That Girl
  2. Skin
  3. Chicago
  4. Running With The Devil
  5. Taker
  6. Swallowed
  7. Saving the Train
  8. Lost & Found
  9. The Affair (Mr. Jones)
  10. Easy Ain't Sleazy
  11. Boogie Love*
  12. Spin
  13. I Just Wanted Your Love
  14. A Little Bit*
  15. L.A. Made Me
  16. Weight
  17. Mail Man*
  18. Hurricane Girl*
  19. Running Back
  20. Shout*

THE BASEMENT RECORDINGS II​
  1. As Usual
  2. Inconveniences
  3. Hunger Pains
  4. Dirty Water
  5. All In Disguise
  6. Gypsy Queen
  7. Lighter Than Air
  8. A Little Bit (prod. Greg Wells)*
  9. Shianne
  10. Hurricane Girl (prod. Greg Wells)*
  11. Stranger With My Face
  12. RocketLand (Look At Those Eyes)*
  13. Crawl

THE BASEMENT RECORDINGS III​
  1. At Your Door
  2. Hero In Me
  3. James Dean
  4. Punk Rock Chick
  5. Small Dreams
  6. I Fell
  7. Shutting You You
  8. The Pledge
  9. What Rock Have I Been Under*
  10. Veins
  11. Where Is The Sky
Hidden Content:
You must either reply or click 'Like' to see the hidden information contained here.

* Not originally on the tracklist. These are leaked demos.​
item.author: TrashBanjo

item.title: 【Unreleased/Unofficial (lossless)】FLAC - Alexz Johnson - Songs from Instant Star (Expanded) [16bit/44.1kHz]
item.description:
All songs performed by Alexz Johnson unless stated otherwise.

SONGS FROM INSTANT STAR I​

  2. Temporary Insanity
  3. Waste My Time
  4. Let Me Fall
